timeline.bodyText: Seems odd to mix calls to getTracer() and direct access to m_tracer in this same method.
timeline.author: j-white
j-white
j-white

timeline.bodyText: I'm guessing this is related to NMS-12503? :)
timeline.author: j-white

timeline.bodyText: We'll need to re-think this for Minion.
timeline.author: j-white

timeline.message:
NMS-12374: Add preDetect to trace start of detect

Add span for InterfaceScan
NMS-12374: Extend tracing from the Provisiond module to RPC client.

NMS-12374: Use callback for detecting start of span for default location

Actual detection depends on thread availability from rescan thread pool.
To exactly know when detection is happening, send callback just before
detect from DetectorClientRpcModule. Callback will start span.
